alert.note: Alert for Greene; Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greene, central Taliaferro and Wilkes Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Ficklin, or near Washington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Washington, Crawfordville, Rayle, Sharon, Ficklin, Lundberg, Metasville, Daniel Springs, Floral Hill, Aonia, Newtown, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Celeste, Lyneville, Raytown, Alexander Stephens Park, Sandy Cross, and Carters Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
